import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline

n, p = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
a = [-1 if a[i] == -1 else a[i] for i in range(n)]
a = [a[i]^i for i in range(n)]
a = [a[i] if a[i]!= -1 else 1-a[i] for i in range(n)]

dp = [[0]*(p+1) for _ in range(n+1)]
dp[0][0] = 1
for i in range(1, n+1):
	for j in range(i+1):
		dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j] + dp[i][j-1]*a[i-1]
		dp[i][j] %= 10**9+7

print(dp[n][p])
